snippet: One of the strangest state parks is on Long Island at the site of an old psychiatric hospital, where the memory of those who lived and died there is all but lost.
abstract: Editorial observes that one of the strangest state parks in New York is on Long Island at the site of Kings Park Psychiatric Center, which has long been abandoned; notes that park's future is unclear, and although it will probably be used as parkland and perhaps include housing, it will not be a refuge for the poor or the mentally ill.
lead_paragraph: One of the strangest state parks is on Long Island at the site of an old psychiatric hospital, where the memory of those who lived and died there is all but lost.

headline.print_headline: Erasing the Past At the Ghost Hospital
headline.seo: Erasing the Past at the Ghost Hospital
headline.main: Erasing the Past at the Ghost Hospital
